set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES "teensy41" CACHE STRING "Build Types reflect PlatformIO Environments" FORCE)

# Convert "Home Directory" that may contain unescaped backslashes on Windows


SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi-teensy/bin/arm-none-eabi-gcc")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi-teensy/bin/arm-none-eabi-g++")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS -fno-exceptions -felide-constructors -fno-rtti -std=gnu++14 -Wno-error=narrowing -fpermissive -fno-threadsafe-statics -Wall -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -mthumb -mcpu=cortex-m7 -nostdlib -mfloat-abi=hard -mfpu=fpv5-d16 -O2)
SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS -Wall -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -mthumb -mcpu=cortex-m7 -nostdlib -mfloat-abi=hard -mfpu=fpv5-d16 -O2)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 14)

    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/*.*
